About GAIA AIR

GAIA AIR provides a comprehensive framework for ethical AI development through the AMEDEO Ontology - a semantic foundation that ensures AI systems adhere to ethical principles while enabling federation across different domains.

Our mission is to create a standardized approach to ethical AI that can be adopted across industries, ensuring that AI systems are developed with human values at their core.
